title: Distribute Funds from a Trust
description: A trustee requests a distribution from a trust account to one of its beneficiaries.

tasks.description: Verify the identity of the trustee and their authority to make distributions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the trustee's identity and legal authority.

tasks.description: Confirm the distribution details: amount and beneficiary's receiving account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately records the distribution instructions.

tasks.description: Process the fund transfer from the trust account to the beneficiary.
